title: Ping issue
body: Hi guys, im living in Hungary and i created an account on the North American server. When i started to play i realised that my MS is constantly about 140 intead of a european server where i had 30 MS. What is the problem? can i solve it? Thank you for your answers

replies.body: The NA server is based in North America and intended players in the NA region.  Your connection to our server will be weaker playing from Hungary because it's taking a long route to get to us.  You can run a [traceroute ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq2)and [submit it to player support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) who can look into your routing, but it's unlikely that you will receive the same strength as you would on EU servers.
